SEARCH
Package org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.tool

Klasse Main

java.lang.Object
org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.tool.Main
public class Main extends Object
Provides external entry points (tool and programmatic) for the javadoc program.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Main

      public Main()
      Creates a default builder to run javadoc.

  • Methodendetails

    • main

      public static void main(String... args)
      The main entry point called by the launcher.

      This will call System.exit with an appropriate return value.

      Parameter:
      args - the command-line parameters

    • execute

      public static int execute(String... args)
      Programmatic interface.
      Parameter:
      args - the command-line parameters
      Gibt zurück:
      The return code.

    • execute

      public static int execute(String[] args, PrintWriter writer)
      Programmatic interface.
      Parameter:
      args - the command-line parameters
      writer - a stream for all output
      Gibt zurück:
      The return code.

    • execute

      public static int execute(String[] args, PrintWriter outWriter, PrintWriter errWriter)
      Programmatic interface.
      Parameter:
      args - the command-line parameters
      outWriter - a stream for expected output
      errWriter - a stream for diagnostic output
      Gibt zurück:
      The return code.

    • setStreams

      public Main setStreams(PrintWriter outWriter, PrintWriter errWriter)
      Sets the output and error streams to be used when running javadoc.

      The streams may be the same; they must not be null.

      Parameter:
      outWriter - the output stream
      errWriter - the error stream
      Gibt zurück:
      this object

    • setFileManager

      public Main setFileManager(StandardJavaFileManager fileManager)
      Sets the file manager to be used when running javadoc.

      A value of null means to use the default file manager.

      Parameter:
      fileManager - the file manager to use
      Gibt zurück:
      this object

    • run

      public Main.Result run(String... args)
      Runs javadoc with preconfigured values and a given set of arguments.

      Any errors will be reported to the error stream, or to System.err if no error stream has been specified with setStreams.

      Parameter:
      args - the arguments
      Gibt zurück:
      a value indicating the success or otherwise of the run
